story_10_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Look, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
The arena’s just up ahead!
story_10_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
All we have to do is register right over there,
and we’ll be all set to compete in the PML!
story_10_51000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Wait a sec... I don’t see Brock anywhere.
He said he would meet us here, right?
story_10_51000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’ve been waiting for you guys to arrive...
with my Tyranitar here.
story_10_51000/2401_1001_0600_10: Whoa... What’s with the outfit, Brock?
story_10_51000/2401_1001_0800_10:
A fashion designer here on Pasio saw some
new kind of potential in my Pokémon and me
and designed it for us.
story_10_51000/2401_1001_0900_10:
It’s proof of how much we’ve grown and
accomplished as a sync pair since coming here.
story_10_51000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Wow, you’ve got so much passion for
this tournament, huh!
story_10_51000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Up until now, my intention was to watch over
[Name:PlayerNickname ] like a mentor Trainer.
story_10_51000/2401_1001_1300_10:
But you’ve all grown into incredible sync pairs.
Even island kahunas and other Gym Leaders
have acknowledged your strength.
story_10_51000/2401_1001_1400_10:
When I see how much you’ve all grown,
I can’t help but want to battle with you myself.
story_10_51000/2401_1001_1500_10: Not as a teammate...but as another Trainer!
story_10_51000/2401_1001_1600_10: Brock... I had no idea you felt that way!
story_10_51000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Well, now you do!
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s battle!
story_10_51000/2401_0401_1900_10:
I had a feeling you might!
Thanks!
story_10_51000/2401_0402_2100_10:
I wouldn’t want you to!
Thanks!
story_10_51000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Show me how strong you’ve become!
